cutoff.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the level at which you decide to stop doing something
cutoff.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: They will review the case and determine a cut-off point at which Medicaid will no longer provide coverage.
There was a rush by builders in January to obtain permits to beat the Jan. 13 cut-off date.
cutoff.translation[0].definitions[1].def: when you stop making, paying, or providing something
cutoff.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The Air Forceâ€™s F-16 could face a production cutoff.
